timeline.bodyText:
Change,
"Failed to schedule MicroProfile Config cache invalidation. The exception is {0}"
to,
"The MicroProfile Config cache invalidation cannot be scheduled. The exception is {0}"
timeline.author: ManasiGandhi
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -32,7 +32,7 @@ no.such.element.CWMCG0300E=CWMCG0300E: The {0} property was not found in the con
 no.such.element.CWMCG0300E.explanation=The requested property did not exist in any of the configured Config Sources.
 no.such.element.CWMCG0300E.useraction=Add the property to one of the existing Config Sources, or add a Config Source that contains the property.
 
-failed.to.schedule.cache.invalidation.CWMCG0301E: Failed to schedule MicroProfile Config cache invalidation. The exception is {0}.
+failed.to.schedule.cache.invalidation.CWMCG0301E=CWMCG0301E: Failed to schedule MicroProfile Config cache invalidation. The exception is {0}.

replies.bodyText: @pnickoll can we make this change? I'm happy with @ManasiGandhi's suggestion.
replies.author: Azquelt

replies.bodyText: Done, can you review again please @ManasiGandhi
replies.author: pnickoll

replies.bodyText: @pnickoll Reviewed the changes. They look good.
replies.author: ManasiGandhi
